ch0240_00_musashi/0101_0701_01_10: Well, look who it is! This must be my lucky day!
ch0240_00_musashi/0101_0701_02_10:
If you come across any strong-looking sync pairs,
you be sure to let me know! And when we find
them... Heh heh heh!
ch0240_00_musashi/0601_0701_01_10: My Arbok is my pride and joy!
ch0240_00_musashi/0601_0701_02_10:
After all the things he and I have been through
together, he’s become far more than just some
run-of-the-mill Arbok!
ch0240_00_musashi/0601_0701_03_10:
Plus, look at the patterns on his stomach! Aren’t
they just adorable?
ch0240_00_musashi/0605_0701_01_10: You know, watching you gets me thinking...
ch0240_00_musashi/0605_0701_02_10:
With all those strong sync pairs on your team,
it seems hard to pull a fast one on you.
ch0240_00_musashi/0605_0701_03_10: But what would we do if we saw an opening...?
ch0240_00_musashi/0605_0701_04_10:
Uh... W-wouldn’t you like to know! But I’ll
never tell.
ch0240_00_musashi/1701_0701_01_10:
There you are! I’ve been looking for
you everywhere!
ch0240_00_musashi/1701_0702_01_10:
Why are you looking at me like that? It’s your cut
of the loot.
ch0240_00_musashi/1701_0702_02_10:
You’re always good to us. It’s only proper to show
you our appreciation.
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0701_01_10:
Are you going out to train? Then let Arbok and
I come. We could use some practice.
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0701_02_10:
Not to mention, we’ll need to make your partner
Pokémon nice and strong for when we hand it
over to the boss...
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0701_03_10:
Hah, you thought I was serious! We would never
do that to you!
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0701_04_10:
Anyway, don’t you want to become stronger?
Come on, let’s go train!
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0702_01_10:
Come on, I know you can do better than that!
Especially with that Pikachu of yours.
ch0240_00_musashi/2501_0702_02_10: Hm? How do I know that? Just a hunch.
ch0240_00_musashi/3001_0701_01_10:
Well, you’re chipper this morning! How am I
supposed to commit dastardly deeds when
you’re so full of energy?!
ch0240_00_musashi/3001_0701_02_10:
Ya haven’t had breakfast yet? It’s the most
important meal of the day, y’know! Don’t look
at me, Jessie! Get your own!
ch0240_00_musashi/3002_0701_01_10:
I’m up early? Well, of course! A child like you
wouldn’t understand how much time and energy
a beauty like me needs to look her best!
ch0240_00_musashi/3002_0701_02_10:
Hah! Who you callin’ a beauty? You clearly
haven’t seen yourself in a mirr— Uhhh, never
mind! I take it back! I take it baaack!
ch0240_00_musashi/3003_0701_01_10:
Ugh, I’m getting so hungry. Does anybody have
something to eat?
ch0240_00_musashi/3003_0701_02_10:
Back off, Jessie! I snagged these Berries for
myself, and I ain’t sharin’! Wh-what are you
lookin’ at, twerp?!
ch0240_00_musashi/3004_0701_01_10:
Team Rocket, huddle! We have to plan the sinister
scheme we’ll commit once night falls!
ch0240_00_musashi/3004_0701_02_10:
Meowth! That’s right! Meticulous planning
is how professional evildoers like us get the
job done!
ch0240_00_musashi/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh, look who’s still awake. Hm? You wanna know
what I’m doing with a shovel at night? Well, when
else are we supposed to dig our traps?
ch0240_00_musashi/3005_0701_02_10:
Our traps aren’t just traps—they’re works of art!
You’re gonna love what we’ve got in store for
ya tomorrow!
ch0240_00_musashi/3006_0701_01_10:
Evil shines in the dark of night! And we won’t
let any twerps get in our way!
ch0240_00_musashi/3006_0701_02_10:
Speakin’ of shine, look at that moon!
It’s makin’ me wanna sing!
